Description:
Remake of the classic 1997 shooter from 3D Realms, created an independent development studio Flying Wild Hog.
Shadow Warrior - is the story of Lena Chi , mercenary corporation " Zilla Enterprises ", who was ordered to get a mysterious sword Nobitsura Kage , granting unlimited power . Learning that unusual blade belongs to ancient gods from another reality , their true intentions and terrible Chi Len becomes reluctant hero . Blades and guns, magic and otherworldly own wits to help him to expose those who are behind the invasion of demons in our world , and send evil back into the darkness .
